description: The array in A059216 read by antidiagonals in 'up' direction.
mathematica: max = 9; t[0, 0] = 1; t[0, _?EvenQ] = 1; t[_?OddQ, 0] = 1; t[n_, k_] /; OddQ[n + k](*up*):= t[n, k] = t[n+1, k-1] + Sum[t[n, j], {j, 0, k-1}]; t[n_, k_] /; EvenQ[n + k](*down*):= t[n, k] = t[n-1, k+1] + Sum[t[j, k], {j, 0, n-1}]; Table[t[n-k, k], {n, 0, max}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 16 2013 *)
author: _Floor van Lamoen_, Jan 18 2001
